Package student

Class Resident

  • java.lang.Object
    • student.Student
      • student.Resident
  • public class Resident
extends Student
    This class is the superclass Resident and contains the profile and the credit hours that the student is taking and also has an operation for financial aid.
    Author:
    Stephen Juan, David Halim

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      (package private) float financialAid  
      (package private) boolean tookFinancialAid

        fulltimeThreshold, minFulltime, universityFee

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Resident​(Profile profile, int creditHours)
      This is a constructor for a resident that passes on values for the student's most recent payment and the date of the most recent payment.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      float getTotalCost()
      Using the number of credits the student of taking, it returns the total cost of tuition.
      boolean isValidFinancial​(float aid)
      This method returns checks the validity of the financial aid amount.
      boolean setFinancialAid​(float aid)
      This method gives the student financial aid to fulltime students onlyone time.
      java.lang.String toString()
      This method returns a string representation of the student in the format "name:major:credit hours:tuition due: last payment:payment date:resident".
      void tuitionDue()
      This method calculates the tuition due by subtracting the total cost of tuition minus the money the student has already paid.

      • Resident

        public Resident​(Profile profile,
                int creditHours)
         throws java.lang.Exception
        This is a constructor for a resident that passes on values for the student's most recent payment and the date of the most recent payment.
        Parameters:
        profile - - profile of the student (from Student)
        creditHours - - number of credits that the student is taking (from Student)
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the credit hours are invalid.

    • Method Detail

      • getTotalCost

        public float getTotalCost()
        Using the number of credits the student of taking, it returns the total cost of tuition.
        Returns:
        total cost of tuition as a float

      • setFinancialAid

        public boolean setFinancialAid​(float aid)
                        throws java.lang.Exception
        This method gives the student financial aid to fulltime students onlyone time.
        Parameters:
        aid - to be given to student.
        Returns:
        true if the aid is given, false if the aid is an invalid number
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if student cannot receive financial aid.

      • isValidFinancial

        public boolean isValidFinancial​(float aid)
        This method returns checks the validity of the financial aid amount.
        Parameters:
        aid - to be given to student.
        Returns:
        true if financial aid is positive and less than 10000, false if otherwise

      • tuitionDue

        public void tuitionDue()
        This method calculates the tuition due by subtracting the total cost of tuition minus the money the student has already paid.
        Overrides:
